sentences.en: Adjust the lighting so it is soft and restful.
sentences.cn: 调节灯光使其看上去既柔和又能给人带来舒缓感。

sentences.en: Better street lighting might help to reduce crime.
sentences.cn: 改善街道照明或许有助于减少犯罪。

sentences.en: Clever lighting and sound effects brought greater realism to the play.
sentences.cn: 巧妙的灯光和音响效果给这出戏注入了更强的现实主义色彩.

sentences.en: He took his time lighting up a cigarette.
sentences.cn: 他不慌不忙地点了一支烟。

sentences.en: Mellow music and lighting helped to create the right atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 柔和的音乐和灯光衬托出了适宜的氛围。

sentences.en: Other causes of migraine are VDU screens and strip-lighting.
sentences.cn: 偏头痛的其他诱因还有电脑的视频显示器和灯管照明。

sentences.en: Smoking and lighting fires strictly forbidden [ prohibited ].
Smoking and lighting fires strictly forbidden.
The costumes and lighting in the play were restrained.
sentences.cn: 这出戏的服装和灯光都很朴实。

sentences.en: The gas lamp gradually lost ground to electric lighting.
sentences.cn: 煤气灯逐渐为电灯所代替.

sentences.en: The lighting in that restaurant is soft and romantic.
sentences.cn: 那个餐馆照明柔和而且浪漫.

sentences.en: The lighting of a wood fire begins with small pieces of wood.
The stage lighting gives the effect of a moonlIt'scene.
sentences.cn: 舞台灯光产生月夜景色的效果.

sentences.en: The whole room is bathed in soft lighting.
sentences.cn: 整个房间沐浴在柔光之中。

sentences.en: They will install a heating and lighting system in our house.
sentences.cn: 他们将在我们家装上供热供电系统.

words.tran_cn: 轻盈的；畅快的；轻率的；明亮的
轻盈；轻松；明亮；（颜色）浅淡

phrases.tran_cn: 照明工程；照明技术；照盲程；照眉术
[电]照明系统；灯光系统，照明方式
n. 自然采光；自然光照
n. 道路照明，道路照明设施

trans.tran_cn: 照明，照明设备，点火，舞台灯光，布光，灯光安排
trans.tran_en: the lights that light a room, building, or street, or the quality of the light produced
